ygData.subject: RE: Level 39 song should be.....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I had sent that in as a suggestion several months ago via the /feedback command.  It would really waste a song slot for something much more useful on a
ygData.messageBody:
> .......Invis to Undead, although a bit late I think it would be useful esp
> in places like L Guk, Unrest, Kith Forest etc.
> A simple song to fill in a missing gap.


I had sent that in as a suggestion several months ago via the
/feedback command. It would really waste a song slot for something
much more useful on a widespread level. But there are times when
I get tired of begging people for an invis at the deadside zone of
lguk.

Until recently, I just realized /feedback is just a link to the
/ignore command. Because that's what the summarily do with your
suggestions.

When is our L47 song comming? Sheesh, they must be really testing
the crap out of it. <sarcasm sarcasm sarcasm>

=)

Harmonic.
